sqlMap.select: SELECT * FROM P_RESER_MST as P WHERE P.P_IDENTIFIER = #pIdentifier#

SELECT AA.TOTAL_QTY, BB.PARKED_QTY, AA.TOTAL_QTY - BB.PARKED_QTY - CC.RESERVED_QTY AS AVABILE_QTY FROM ( ( SELECT MAX(P_AVAIBLE_QTY) AS TOTAL_QTY FROM P_CONFIG_INFO ) AA, ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS PARKED_QTY FROM P_RESER_MST WHERE ( P_SPOT_NUMBER IS NOT NULL AND P_PAYMENT_YN ='N' ))BB, ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS RESERVED_QTY FROM P_RESER_MST WHERE P_SPOT_NUMBER IS NULL ) CC )

SELECT (SELECT CASE COUNT(*) WHEN 0 THEN 'FAIL' WHEN 1 THEN 'SUCCESS' ELSE 'ERROR' END FROM P_RESER_MST WHERE P_IDENTIFIER = #pIdentifier# AND P_SPOT_NUMBER IS NOT NULL) as STATUS, (SELECT P_SPOT_NUMBER FROM P_RESER_MST WHERE P_IDENTIFIER = #pIdentifier#) AS SPOT

SELECT
P_SPOT_NUMBER, P_ENTER_TIME
FROM P_RESER_MST
WHERE P_IDENTIFIER = #pIdentifier#
SELECT P_RESER_TIME FROM P_RESER_MST WHERE P_IDENTIFIER = #pIdentifier#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO p_reser_mst( P_IDENTIFIER, P_RESER_TELNO, P_RESER_TIME, P_SPOT_NUMBER, P_CREATE_DT, P_UPDATE_DT) VALUE( #pIdentifier#, #pReserTelno#, #pReserTime#, #pSpotNumber#, now(), now())
sqlMap.update: UPDATE p_reser_mst SET p_spot_number = #pSpotNumber#, P_enter_time = #cTime# WHERE p_identifier = #pIdentifier#
UPDATE P_RESER_MST SET P_PAYMENT = #pPayment#, P_EXIT_TIME = #pExitTime# WHERE P_IDENTIFIER = #pIdentifier#
